item.title: Reddit预计广告销售强劲，批准股票回购计划
item.description: Reddit公司公布的本季度销售额超出华尔街预期，这反映出该公司作为上市公司仅两年时间，其广告业务已呈现强劲增长态势。【原文：Reddit Inc. projected current-quarter sales that surpassed Wall Street’s expectations, a reflection on the company’s growing advertising business just two years in as a publicly traded company.】

item.title: 为何深陷困境的泰国民众仍执着于永远无法实现的变革？
item.description:
本周末的选举中，主张全面改革的政党将与两个承诺推行更民粹主义政策的阵营展开角逐。【原文：

This weekend’s election pits a party campaigning on sweeping reform against two blocks pledging more populist policies

】

item.title: 高市早苗需要获得曾排斥她的政党的选票才能赢得大选
item.description:
当国家正决定其主张力度时，一位新的中间派挑战者正为选举注入不确定性。

【原文：

As the nation decides how assertive it wants to be, a new centrist challenger is injecting uncertainty into the election.

】

item.title: 金属热潮有望推动澳大利亚企业盈利反弹
item.description: 随着金属价格的反弹为澳大利亚关键的采矿业注入强劲动力，该国最大型企业有望迎来二月份的业绩旺季。【原文：Australia’s biggest companies are on course for an upbeat February results season as a rally in metals prices supercharges earnings in the nation’s key mining sector.】

item.title: 私募资本巨头争相护航软件公司，人工智能领域溃败加剧
item.description: 金融界新晋超级富豪们纷纷在电视广告、财报电话会议和领英帖子中登场，异口同声地发出呼吁：别把对人工智能的担忧发泄到私募信贷基金上。【原文：High finance’s new ultra-rich lined up one by one, in TV spots, earnings calls and LinkedIn posts, to make the same pitch: Don’t take out big AI fears on private credit funds.】

item.title: 密歇根州总检察长敦促重新审议甲骨文数据中心电力计划
item.description: 密歇根州总检察长达娜·内塞尔周四向州监管机构提交动议，要求重新审议其批准公用事业公司DTE能源为甲骨文和OpenAI规划的超大型数据中心项目供电的决定。【原文：Michigan Attorney General Dana Nessel filed a motion with state regulators Thursday to reconsider their approval for utility DTE Energy to power a massive data center development planned by Oracle and OpenAI.】

item.title: 高盛称甲骨文债券大卖将引发人工智能融资热潮
item.description: 高盛集团承销部门表示，甲骨文公司创纪录的债券发行交易缓解了债务市场的紧张情绪，为其他科技巨头筹集数千亿美元用于数据中心基础设施建设铺平了道路。【原文：The relief in debt markets after Oracle’s record-setting bond deal has primed the pump for other tech giants looking to raise hundreds of billions of dollars for data-center infrastructure, according to the syndicate desk at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州拟对百万富翁征税以翻新公立校园
item.description: 马萨诸塞大学校长马蒂·米汉表示，该校多数建筑建于20世纪50至60年代，老化迹象已十分明显。每逢降雨，屋顶便会渗漏。即便在新英格兰严寒的冬季，学生们仍需撬开窗户，为闷热的宿舍通风换气。【原文：Most of the buildings at the University of Massachusetts were constructed in the 1950s and the 1960s, and the signs of aging are clear, President Marty Meehan says. When it rains, roofs leak. And even during harsh New England winters, students crack windows open to air out stuffy dorm rooms.】

item.title: 加拿大鹅股价创六年最大跌幅，财报未达预期
item.description: 加拿大鹅控股公司（Canada Goose Holdings Inc.）在加拿大上市的股票正面临逾六年来的最大跌幅，尽管今年冬季严寒，这家奢侈羽绒服制造商的关键盈利指标仍未达预期。【原文：Canada Goose Holdings Inc.’s Canadian shares are on pace for the worst decline in over six years after the luxury parka maker missed on key earnings metrics despite a frigid winter season.】

item.title: 更便宜的非专利减肥药即将上市
item.description:
在今天的《Big Take》播客中：诺和诺德公司对Ozempic的专利即将到期。这对全球减肥药市场意味着什么？

【原文：

On today’s Big Take podcast: Novo Nordisk’s patents on Ozempic are starting to expire. What does that mean for the global weight-loss drug market?

】

item.title: 天狼星XM的播客推广伴随风险
item.description: 该公司是覆盖范围最广的播客网络，但其为主持人建立卫星广播听众群的努力前景尚不明朗。【原文：The company is the top podcast network by reach, but its effort to build a satellite radio following for hosts is uncertain】

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官库克承诺就移民问题游说立法者
item.description: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆·库克向员工表示，他对当前的移民政策感到"深感忧心"，并将继续向立法者施压。【原文：Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook told employees that he’s “deeply distraught” with the current immigration and will continue pressing the issue with lawmakers.】

item.title: 以太坊跌至八个月低点，加密货币暴跌加剧
item.description: 以太坊（Ether）作为全球第二大数字代币，周四暴跌逾10%至1911美元，创下自5月以来的最低盘中价格，因持续数月的加密货币价格暴跌态势进一步加剧。【原文：Ether, the second-largest digital token, slid as as much as 10% on Thursday to $1,911, hitting its lowest intraday price since May as a months-long rout in cryptocurrencies prices deepens.】

item.title: 阿根廷称已与特朗普政府签署美阿贸易协定
item.description: 阿根廷表示已与特朗普政府签署贸易和投资协议，兑现了总统哈维尔·米莱开放南美经济的承诺。【原文：Argentina said it signed a trade and investment agreement with the Trump administration, delivering on President Javier Milei’s commitment to open up the South American economy.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行近两年首次暂停降息
item.description: 墨西哥央行维持基准利率不变，暂停了近两年前启动的宽松周期，因核心通胀率徘徊在容忍区间的上限附近。【原文：Mexico’s central bank kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged, pausing an easing cycle it started nearly two years ago as core inflation hovers just above the upper limit of the tolerance range.】

item.title: 拥挤的对冲基金国债交易面临快速平仓风险
item.description: 在市场担忧美联储资产负债表政策可能转向以及更广泛风险可能引发债券市场再度波动之际，一种高度杠杆化的对冲基金策略正显现出压力迹象。【原文：A highly leveraged hedge fund strategy is flashing signs of strain amid concern that a potential shift in Federal Reserve balance-sheet policy and broader risks could fuel renewed volatility in bonds.】

item.title: 动力设备制造商Forgent公司股价在15亿美元IPO后下跌
item.description: 福杰特电力解决方案公司股价下跌3.7%，此前该公司及其部分支持者在美国首次公开募股中筹集了15亿美元。【原文：Forgent Power Solutions Inc. shares declined 3.7% after the company and some of its backers raised $1.5 billion in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰未见科技股"危险信号"，股价延续创纪录跌势
item.description: 蓝猫资本公司管理层向投资者表示，其软件贷款组合处于"完美无瑕"的状态，否认了人工智能驱动抛售带来的风险，尽管该公司股价周四继续遭受重创。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc.’s management told investors that its software lending portfolio is in “pristine” condition, dismissing risks from the AI-driven sell off, even as its shares continued to be punished on Thursday.】

item.title: Y Combinator撤销停止投资加拿大企业的决定
item.description: 初创企业孵化器Y Combinator表示，将重新投资注册于加拿大的公司，此举扭转了此前拒绝投资该国企业的决定，此前加拿大企业家曾对此表示不满。【原文：Startup incubator Y Combinator said it will once again invest in Canada-incorporated companies, reversing course after Canadian entrepreneurs complained about its decision to spurn the country’s firms.】

item.title: 加密货币暴跌引发数字资产库存股全面溃退
item.description: 购买并持有加密货币曾是某些公司实现快速巨额收益的可靠途径，如今随着比特币较峰值暴跌逾45%，这类企业的股价正随数字资产一同下跌。【原文：Buying and holding cryptocurrencies used to be a surefire way for some companies to achieve quick and large gains, now with Bitcoin plunging more than 45% from its peak, shares of such firms are going down with digital assets.】

item.title: 交易员密切关注图表以寻找股市暴跌可能止步的迹象
item.description: 科技股抛售潮持续发酵，标普500指数徘徊于关键技术趋势线附近，交易员们正仔细研究图表，试图判断该股指基准还有多大下跌空间。【原文：A snowballing tech stock selloff has the S&P 500 Index hovering near a key technical trend line, with traders poring over charts to determine how much further the equity benchmark might fall.】

item.title: Palantir在曼哈顿寻求办公空间，以实现全市范围的扩张
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc.正在曼哈顿寻求更多办公空间，加入了众多在纽约市扩张的科技公司行列。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. is seeking more office capacity in Manhattan, joining a slew of tech firms expanding across New York City.】

item.title: 据称CSN计划通过有担保贷款筹集高达15亿美元资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，巴西综合企业CSN计划通过有担保贷款筹集高达15亿美元资金，用于偿还到期债券并改善其债务状况。【原文：Brazilian conglomerate CSN is planning to raise as much as $1.5 billion in a secured loan to pay off maturing bonds and improve its debt profile, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 鲍勃折扣家具公司IPO募资3.31亿美元后股价大涨11%
item.description: 由贝恩资本支持的家居零售商鲍勃折扣家具公司周四在美股首次公开募股中筹集3.31亿美元后，其股票在首日交易中一度大涨11%。【原文：Bob’s Discount Furniture Inc., a home furnishings retailer backed by Bain Capital, jumped as much as 11% in its trading debut Thursday, after the company raised $331 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 华尔街交易员预测比特币图表将跌至何种程度
item.description: 许多看涨比特币的论调突然同时崩塌。【原文：Many of the bullish Bitcoin narratives are suddenly breaking down all at once.】

item.title: 白银波动率攀升，杠杆ETF成焦点
item.description: 白银价格的波动性因杠杆交易所交易产品的日益普及而加剧，使其价格波动比以往任何时候都更为剧烈。【原文：Silver’s volatility has been amplified by the growing popularity of leveraged exchange-traded products, making its price swings more violent than ever.】

item.title: Anthropic发布新模型，擅长金融研究
item.description: Anthropic公司正推出其最强大的人工智能模型的新版本，该模型专为执行金融研究而设计。此前该公司进军法律服务领域，导致传统软件制造商的股价大幅波动。【原文：Anthropic is releasing a new version of its most powerful AI model that’s designed to carry out financial research, days after the company’s push into legal services upended the stocks of legacy software makers.】

item.title: Tether向加密银行Anchorage Digital投资1亿美元
item.description: Tether Holdings SA向Anchorage Digital Bank NA投资1亿美元，使这家联邦特许加密银行的估值升至42亿美元。【原文：Tether Holdings SA invested $100 million in Anchorage Digital Bank NA, boosting the federally charted crypto bank’s valuation to $4.2 billion.】

item.title: 沙特下调亚洲买家关键油价，显示供应过剩
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯将亚洲买家主要原油等级的价格下调至数年来的最低水平，这进一步表明全球供应正超过需求。【原文：Saudi Arabia dropped the price of its main oil grade for buyers in Asia to the lowest in years, a further sign that global supplies are running ahead of demand.】

item.title: 麦克莱姆警告勿以降息抵消结构性变化
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫·麦克勒姆警告称，在经济适应结构性变革期间降息，可能助长未来通胀风险。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem warned that cutting interest rates while the economy is adapting to structural changes risks stoking future inflation.】
